name.baseName: cement production;cement, portland cement, 52.5RMPa;modern dry process, five-stage kiln external decomposition, 4000 t/d
水泥生产;水泥, 硅酸盐水泥, 52.5RMPa;现代干法, 五级窑外分解技术, 4000 t/d

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The company's production process uses RSP five-stage kiln external decomposition technology, and mainly adopts advanced production equipment from Germany, France, Japan, and some domestic companies. The cement production line consists of a vertical raw mill, a 5-stage RSP (kiln external pre-decomposition tower), a rotary kiln, and a large ball mill equipped with a roller press, as well as gypsum crushing, limestone grinding, and conveying and adding equipment.
该公司的生产工艺采用五级窑外分解技术，主要采用德国、法国、日本及部分国内先进的生产设备。水泥生产线有立式原料磨、5级窑外预分解塔、回转窑和配有辊压机的大型球磨机等主要设备组成，同时设有石膏破碎、石灰石粉碎及输送添加设备。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The company now has a 4000t/d modern dry process production line (RSP kiln external decomposition equipment) as shown in Figure 6.2, its own independently mined open-pit limestone mine (annual limestone production capacity of 2 million tons) and a dedicated railway line in the factory. The special line for bulk cement outputs the terminal, with an annual production of 1.9 million tons of cement.The company's production process adopts RSP five-stage kiln external decomposition technology, mainly using advanced production equipment from Germany, France, Japan and some domestic countries. The cement production line consists of main equipment such as a vertical raw material mill (as shown in Figure 6.1), a 5-stage RSP (pre-calcining tower outside the kiln), a rotary kiln and a large ball mill equipped with a roller press. It is also equipped with gypsum crushing and limestone crushing and conveying and adding equipment.

公司现拥有一条4000t/d 规模的现代干法生产线(RSP窑外分解设备)如图 6.2所示，自己独立开采的露天石灰石矿山(年生产石灰石能力为 200 万吨)和厂内铁路专用线及散装水泥专用线输出码头，年生产水泥 190 万吨。该公司的生产工艺采用 RSP 五级窑外分解技术，主要采用德国、法国、日本及部分国内先进的生产设备。水泥生产线有立式原料磨(如图 6.1 所示)、5级 RSP(窑外预分解塔)、回转窑和配有辊压机的大型球磨机等主要设备组成，同时设有石膏破碎、石灰石粉碎及输送添加设备。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described cement production process involves the manufacture of 52.5RMPa portland cement using a modern dry method with a five-stage kiln external decomposition technology. The cement produced is typically used for high-strength concrete structures, paving, precast concrete products, and large-scale construction projects demanding high-performance cement. The process is operated by the Dalian Cement Company which has a production capacity of 4000 tons per day, utilizing advanced equipment for raw material preparation, pre-calcining, clinkering, and milling, with on-site limestone mining to ensure a steady supply of raw materials.
本工艺描述的是52.5RMPa硅酸盐水泥的生产，采用现代干法和五级窑外分解技术。生产的水泥通常用于高强度混凝土结构、铺路、预制混凝土制品以及要求高性能水泥的大规模建筑项目。过程由大连水泥公司操作，日产能力为4000吨，使用先进设备进行原料准备、预煅烧、熟料烧成及磨制，且有现场石灰石矿山确保原料的稳定供应。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: LCA method was not used for modeling.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Cement product evaluation index data is obtained through on-site surveys at cement production enterprises, and the index data comes from enterprise production process data.Due to the lack of specific industrial pollutant emission statistics, the data collection process is very difficult, and some data cannot be obtained directly, so it is obtained by converting related energy and raw materials.
水泥产品评价指标数据通过到水泥生产企业实地调研获得，指标数据来自于企业生产工艺数据。由于缺乏具体的工业污染物排放统计数据，数据收集过程十分困难，部分数据无法直接获取，因此采用相关能源与原材料折算的方式获取。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 李礼. (2012). 建筑材料绿色性的6E综合评价体系研究 [博士, 大连理工大学].
李礼. (2012). 建筑材料绿色性的6E综合评价体系研究 [博士, 大连理工大学].

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: DOCC is a large-scale cement production enterprise jointly constructed and operated by Pacific Cement Co., Ltd. and China Huaneng Integrated Industries Corporation. The company was founded in 1989, covering an area of ​​500,000 square meters with a total investment of US$188 million. The company currently has 376 employees. The company now has a 4,000t/d modern dry process production line (reinforced suspension preheater (RSP) outside the kiln decomposition equipment), its own independently mined open-pit limestone mine (annual limestone production capacity of 2 million tons) and The factory has a dedicated railway line and a dedicated line for bulk cement output to the terminal, with an annual production of 1.9 million tons of cement. The company has now passed ISO14001:2004 environmental management system certification.

DOCC是由太平洋水泥株式会和中国华能综合产业公司两方合资建设并经营的一座大型水泥生产企业。公司成立于1989年，占地面积50万平方米总投资1.88亿美元，公司现有从业人员376人。公司现拥有一条4000t/d规模的现代干法生产线（加强悬浮预热器 （Reinforced Suspension Preheater ，RSP）窑外分解设备），自己独立开采的露天石灰石矿山（年生产石灰石能力为200万吨）和厂内铁路专用线及散装水泥专用线输出码头，年生产水泥190万吨。公司现已通过ISO14001：2004环境管理体系认证证书。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users applying this data set for Life Cycle Assessment should note the following: Ensure the technological relevance of the data by matching the described dry process technology with the specific cement production process under study. Analyze the representativeness of the production scale in relation to the assessed scenario. Consider data quality regarding the availability and reliability of emissions and energy consumption data, given the challenges in direct data collection mentioned. This data set does not employ LCA modeling, so users may need to adapt the methodology accordingly. ISO14001:2004 certification indicates that the company has an environmental management system in place, which might influence environmental impact assessments.
使用此数据集进行生命周期评估的用户应注意以下事项：确保通过与研究中的具体水泥生产过程匹配来保证数据的技术相关性。分析生产规模的代表性与评估场景的相关性。鉴于提及的直接数据收集挑战，考虑排放和能耗数据的可用性和可靠性。此数据集未采用LCA建模，用户可能需要相应地调整方法论。ISO14001:2004认证表明该公司有一个环境管理系统，这可能会影响环境影响评估。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

粘土
Iron powder
铁粉
Gupsum
石膏
Electricity
电
Coal
原煤

SO2. The main source of SO2 emissions in the production of building materials is from sulfides contained in fuels and raw materials. Due to the lack of statistical data on industrial pollutant emissions, it is very difficult to collect data, and some data cannot be obtained directly. Therefore, an energy and raw material conversion method is used to obtain the data.
SO2。建材制品生产过程中排放的SO2主要来源于燃料和原料中所含的硫化物。

NOX. The emissions of NOx in the production of building materials come from two main sources. The first is the combination of N and O2 in the air at high temperatures, which is directly related to the temperature. The second is the low-temperature combination of N and O2 in the fuel, which is related to the concentration of O2. Due to the lack of statistical data on industrial pollutant emissions, it is very difficult to collect data, and some data cannot be obtained directly. Therefore, an energy and raw material conversion method is used to obtain the data.
NOx。建材制品生产过程中排放的NOx来源主要两种途径。第一种，在高温状态下，空气中的N与O2化合而成，与温度高低有着直接关系。第二种，燃料中的N与O2低温化合而成，与O2的浓度有关系。

CO2. The main sources of CO2 emissions in the building materials industry are from fuel combustion and raw material decomposition. Due to the lack of statistical data on industrial pollutant emissions, it is very difficult to collect data, and some data cannot be obtained directly. Therefore, an energy and raw material conversion method is used to obtain the data.
CO2。建材工业CO2的产生途径主要来源于燃料燃烧和原材料分解。

Dust, with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter. The production of dust in the production of building materials is related to the content of powdered materials in the raw materials. Due to the lack of statistical data on industrial pollutant emissions, it is very difficult to collect data, and some data cannot be obtained directly. Therefore, an energy and raw material conversion method is used to obtain the data.
粉尘。建材制品生产过程中粉尘的产生与原材料中粉状物含量有关。未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。

COD (chemical oxygen demand) (mg/l). Chemical oxygen demand (COD) refers to the amount of oxidant consumed when treating wastewater with a strong oxidant. It is used to measure the degree of organic pollution in wastewater. The larger the COD value, the more severe the wastewater pollution. Due to the lack of statistical data on industrial pollutant emissions, it is very difficult to collect data, and some data cannot be obtained directly. Therefore, an energy and raw material conversion method is used to obtain the data.
化学需氧量（mg/l）。化学需氧量（COD）是指采用强氧化剂处理废水时，所消耗的氧化剂的量。用它来衡量废水受有机物污染的指标，化学需氧量越大说明废水污染越严重。

SS (suspended solids) (mg/l). The suspended solids in the wastewater discharged from the building materials industry mainly refer to inorganic substances, organic substances, sediment, clay, microorganisms, and other substances that are insoluble in water. Due to the lack of statistical data on industrial pollutant emissions, it is very difficult to collect data, and some data cannot be obtained directly. Therefore, an energy and raw material conversion method is used to obtain the data.
悬浮物（SS）（mg/l）。建材工业废水排放中的悬浮物主要是指不溶于水的无机物、有机物、泥沙、粘土、微生物等。

Petroleum (mg/l). Oil pollution in wastewater mainly comes from production enterprises such as steel, coking, and petrochemicals. According to the size of the oil droplet diameter, there are three forms of oil substances in wastewater: floating oil, dispersed oil, and emulsified oil, and the difficulty of separation from wastewater increases in that order. Due to the lack of statistical data on industrial pollutant emissions, it is very difficult to collect data, and some data cannot be obtained directly. Therefore, an energy and raw material conversion method is used to obtain the data.
石油类（mg/l）。废水中的油类污染物主要米源于钢铁、焦化、石油化工等生产企业。根据油滴粒径的出大到小，油类物质在废水中有三种存在形式：上浮油、分散油、乳化油，其从废水中的分离难度也依次递增。

Solid waste refers to the solid waste generated during the production process, such as dust (with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter). Due to the lack of statistical data on industrial pollutant emissions, it is very difficult to collect data, and some data cannot be obtained directly. Therefore, an energy and raw material conversion method is used to obtain the data.
固废，文中指生产过程中产生的扬尘等固体废弃物。未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。
Cement, PⅡ52.5R
水泥，PⅡ52.5R
